articles.content:
Anti-U.S., Anti-War Struggle Called for in S. Korea 
   Pyongyang, August 23 (KCNA) -- Jang Song Hoe, chairman of the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils, reportedly issued a special appeal titled "Let us make the banner of 'By our nation itself' our faith and devote worthwhile youth to the anti-U.S. and anti-war struggle" on August 3.
 The ceaseless U.S. war moves are further straining the situation of the Korean Peninsula and blocking the development of the inter-Korean relations and the movement for national reunification, the appeal said, calling on all the fellow countrymen to conduct a vigorous movement against the U.S. and war, keeping in mind the idea of "By our nation itself" as their faith.    
 The appeal called upon the students to take the lead in the struggle for independent reunification against the U.S. and war under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself."
